com.google.crypto.tink.subtle

Class Ed25519

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.subtle.Ed25519

  • @Alpha
public final class Ed25519
extends Object
    This implementation is based on the ed25519/ref10 implementation in NaCl. The twisted Edwards curve implemented: -x^2 + y^2 = 1 + (-121665 / 121666 mod 2^255-19)*x^2*y^2 See Bernstein D.J., Birkner P., Joye M., Lange T., Peters C. (2008) Twisted Edwards Curves. Hisil H., Wong K.KH., Carter G., Dawson E. (2008) Twisted Edwards Curves Revisited. for more information.
